question: Do you prefer user-friendliness or more customization?

answers.answer: User-friendliness - I just don't have the time or skill to dive deep into the OS.
Customization - I love a good learning curve and being able to customize the OS to my liking.
No preference

question: Do you prefer style or raw performace?

answers.answer: Style is way more important! I use my machine every day! It has to look nice, even if performance is sacrificed!
I prefer performance! I'm buying an expensive machine, I need every ounce of performance possible, even if the machine looks bad!
No preference

question: Do you prefer a locked ecosystem or an open ecosystem?

answers.answer: Closed ecosystem! When a company has full control of the hardware and software, the consumer benefits from the integration that comes from that.
Open ecosystem! I like having more options and the freedom that comes from more choices!
No preference
